name: 123 Slaughter Me Street 2
description: In this exciting prequel to the hit game "123 Slaughter Me Street", we find out the deep dark secrets that lead up to the madness of this series. You find yourself confused with blood on your hands in a dark house with only a flashlight to guide you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel / AMD 2.4-2.7 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD R7 250X / Nvidia 750ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
